headline.main: The Portable MP3 Player That Won't Stop the Music

lead_paragraph: Last year, while many portable MP3 players were waging a war of slowly escalating storage capacity -- 32 MB, 64 MB, 128 MB -- Creative Technology flew overhead and dropped the big one: the Nomad Jukebox with six gigabytes of storage, enough for 100 hours of MP3's, the equivalent of about 150 CD's. Archos, a French company, is now taking on Creative in the heavy-load MP3 market. The Archos Jukebox 6000 is essentially a six-gigabyte hard drive with a speaker attached. It can be used as a portable player or played through a computer. (Archos even suggests that it can also be used as a backup hard drive.)
abstract: Review of new MP3 from French manufacturer Archos, Archos Jukebox 6000, with six gigabytes of storage, sufficient for holding 100 hours of MP3's; this equates to 150 CD's worth of musical programming; photo (S)
